name: Wally wo Sagase!
overview: Wally wo Sagase!, is a rare arcade unit video game based on Japanese translation of the Where's Waldo? franchise. The unique arcade unit, created by Sega, was released in Japan in 1992. Using the console controls (a trackball and select button), a player was asked to locate and select Waldo, known as Wally, in an assortment of scenes before the level's time rans out. The game allowed up to 3 players to compete at a time
